Comment: The response provides a detailed explanation of the concept of the "spirit of antichrist" based on key passages from the New Testament. It effectively connects the idea of the antichrist to those who deny Jesus Christ and His divinity, emphasizing the importance of recognizing this spirit to guard against deception. The student demonstrates a good understanding of the Christian perspective on this topic and effectively addresses the concern raised. Great job!
